name: Carpenter's Hand from Lolinda
description: Armagnac plus the honey-sweetness of Drambuie and a splash of dry sherry makes for a boozy but balanced drink, "a great pre or post-dinner tipple," per Lane's recommendation.
recipeIngredient: 1/2 ounce Amontillado sherry, such as Hidalgo Napoleon

recipeInstructions.text: Fill an old fashioned glass with ice (one large cube looks nice.) Add armagnac, sherry, and Drambuie. Stir for 15 seconds. Garnish with orange twist and serve.
